reqs:
Co-reqs: One of THTR 305, THTR 306, THTR 307, THTR 308, THTR 350, THTR 352, THTR 354, THTR 356.
Students wishing to take 399C must be registered in at least ONE of the following courses in the same term:
THTR 305, 306, 307, 308, 350, 352, 354, 356
description: Assigned projects in theatre design and production.
